commands.create: create a new project with the given project name
commands.init: initialize a project in the current folder
commands.update: update the root files of the project
commands.eject: eject the configuration files of the project
commands.run: run a command with nps with the configuration of gobstones-scrips

args.type: the project type to create, one of {{options}}
args.packageManager: the project manager to use, one of {{options}}
args.silent: run silently, not displaying the tool's banner
args.debug: run in debug mode, printing all the internal tool's processing
args.test: run using verdaccio as a registry
args.useLocalTsconfigJson: Use the tsconfig.json file at project root
